title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be a single operation
OB: When pressing Ok, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The issue is caused by setting the output location and classpath as two separate operations, which creates an illegal state.
EB: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be offered as a single operation. Similar to the validation process, where classpath and output location are checked together, the setting of classpath / output location should be combined into one operation. Additionally, the error message should be improved to say: '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'.
